title: Sri Venkateswara College of Law, Tirupati - Admissions, Contact, Website, Facilities 2025-2026
meta_description: Sri Venkateswara College of Law, Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, L.L.B, BA + L.L.B, L.L.M . 3 Courses. Average Fees is 32000 per year.

Section.name: About Sri Venkateswara College of Law
Section.description:
Sri Venkateswara College of Law got permission from the Government of Andhra Pradesh in 1991 and Affiliated to S.V.University, Tirupathi. They used to get renewal of affiliation from the Bar Council of India from time to time. The College is dedicated to create a new breed of dynamic and future ready Law Graduates who will be in a position to use the knowledge acquired here towards the creation of a better society and indeed, a brighter future for themselves.
The main Aim of establishing the institution is not merely to turn out Graduates in Law but to produce good citizens with a vision of turning out of its portals legally component human resource excelling both in academics and values. They provide the best opportunities and environment for higher education and enable them to attain very high levels of academic excellence and leadership qualities.
